#summary Tracking of validation features specific to EPUB 3 Media Overlays
#labels Phase-Implementation,media-overlay,epub3

The OverlayChecker::validate() method currently only verifies the publication's SMIL file(s), it should also verify the OPF metadata specific to Media Overlays (total duration == sum of individual spine items duration, CSS "active" class checks?).

[http://code.google.com/p/epubcheck/source/browse/branches/epub3-maven/com.adobe.epubcheck/src/main/java/com/adobe/epubcheck/overlay/OverlayChecker.java com.adobe.epubcheck.overlay.OverlayChecker]

The OverlayHandler class doesn't verify durations (clip-begin / end pairs), it should also cross-check with the corresponding OPF metadata.

[http://code.google.com/p/epubcheck/source/browse/branches/epub3-maven/com.adobe.epubcheck/src/main/java/com/adobe/epubcheck/overlay/OverlayHandler.java com.adobe.epubcheck.overlay.OverlayHandler]

The OverlayCheckerFactory doesn't need to do anything else.

[http://code.google.com/p/epubcheck/source/browse/branches/epub3-maven/com.adobe.epubcheck/src/main/java/com/adobe/epubcheck/overlay/OverlayCheckerFactory.java com.adobe.epubcheck.overlay.OverlayCheckerFactory]
